metadata.Plot: The history of the game-changing partnership between a then undiscovered Michael Jordan and Nike's fledgling basketball division which revolutionized the world of sports and culture with the Air Jordan brand.
metadata.Actors: Matt Damon, Jason Bateman, Ben Affleck
